```{r}


map( ~ {
  tmp_list = read.csv(.x)
  
  
  
  
  
  bind_rows(c('set3_learn','set6_learn') %>% 
              map(~ tmp_list$data %>% 
                    .[[.x]] %>% 
                    reduce(rbind) %>% 
                    data.frame() %>% 
                    mutate(condition =.x)
                  
              ) %>% 
              reduce(bind_rows) %>% 
              pivot_longer(cols = starts_with('x')),
            
            
            
            c('set3_test', 'set6_test') %>% 
              
              map (~ {temp <- tmp_list$data %>% 
                .[[.x]]
              
              data.frame(
                condition=.x, 
                name=paste0('x', rep(c(1:12), 25)), 
                value=rep(temp, 12)
              )
              
              }
              )
            )%>%
    mutate(data = .x)  
    
}
) %>% 
  reduce(bind_rows)


```
